scripts.test:minprice: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupminprice 0 && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 getstrategy
scripts.test:maxsize: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupmaxsize 20000000 && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 getstrategy
scripts.test:maxduration: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupmaxduration 30 && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 getstrategy
scripts.test:maxcollateral: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupmaxcollateral 100 && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 getstrategy
scripts.test:endpoint: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupendpoint https://nftstorage.link && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 getstrategy
scripts.test:setweb3storage: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupendpoint https://w3s.link && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 subscribe https://w3s.link && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setpinningservice web3.storage https://api.web3.storage/
scripts.test:setnftstorage: node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setupendpoint https://nftstorage.link && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 subscribe https://nftstorage.link && node src/provider.js --debug --name=broker --port=8000 setpinningservice nft.storage https://api.nft.storage/
